name: production-deploy  # Matches (?i)deploy|production-deploy|publish|release
 
on:

  workflow_dispatch:     # Allows manual trigger for your friend

  push:

    branches:

      - main             # Matches (?i)prod|production|main

      - production
 
jobs:

  deploy-job:

    name: "Run Production Publish" # Also matches the deployment regex

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:

      - name: Checkout Code

        uses: actions/checkout@v4
 
      - name: Simulate Deployment

        run: |

          echo "Starting deployment process..."

          sleep 5

          echo "Deployment to production successful!"
